sentences.en: At 18 she made her debut at a big party at the Ritz.
sentences.cn: 十八岁时她在莉芝饭店的大宴会中初次作社交性的露面.

sentences.en: Dundee United's Dave Bowman makes his international debut.
sentences.cn: 邓迪联队的戴夫·鲍曼首次亮相国际比赛。

sentences.en: He marked his debut by beating the champion.
sentences.cn: 他初次上阵即击败了冠军而一鸣惊人.

sentences.en: Helen made her debut at a party when she was eighteen.
sentences.cn: 海伦十八岁时在一次聚会上初次进入社交界.

sentences.en: Paula is the only artist to achieve four number ones from a debut album.
sentences.cn: 葆拉是唯一的首张唱片4次荣登排行榜榜首的艺人。

sentences.en: She made her debut in a 1937 production of "Hamlet."
sentences.cn: 她在1937年《哈姆雷特》的演出中首次登台。

sentences.en: She was already a famous model and pin-up by the time she made her film debut.
sentences.cn: 步入影坛时，她已是名模和海报女郎了。

sentences.en: She was scarcely 18 when she made her debut.
So you're saying I'm making my debut into society with Newport's most wanted?
sentences.cn: 那么,你是说我要和新港头号通缉犯一起做首次涉世登台了?

sentences.en: The 18-year-old made his debut last week as a replacement for the injured Gordon Durie.
sentences.cn: 这个18岁选手作为受伤的戈登·迪里的替补在上周首次出场。

sentences.en: The actress made her debut in the new comedy.
sentences.cn: 这位演员在那出新喜剧中首次登台演出.

sentences.en: The atmosphere after Wednesday's debut was as darkly comic as the film itself.
sentences.cn: 星期三首映之后的气氛就如电影本身一样，充满了黑色喜剧色彩。

sentences.en: The film marks her directorial debut.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是她作为导演初露头角的标志。

sentences.en: The group's debut album was immediately acclaimed a hip hop classic.
sentences.cn: 这个组合的首张专辑一经推出便被盛赞为嘻哈乐的经典之作。

sentences.en: Their debut single is a stunner.
sentences.cn: 他们的首张单曲成绩斐然。

sentences.en: What do you remember about your first - team debut, against Charlton in October 1956?
sentences.cn: 你对自己的 一线 队处子秀怎么看? 那是1956年10月和查尔顿的比赛.

trans.tran_en: the first public appearance of an entertainer, sports player etc or of something new and important
to appear in public or become available for the first time
